resources.string: Touch any text box to start typing
You don\'t have a SIM card installed in the phone, so it can\'t connect to a mobile network for voice or data services. You can connect to a Wi-Fi network without a SIM.
Would you like to connect to a Wi-Fi network now?
You don’t have a network connection.

This could be a temporary problem or your phone may not be provisioned for data services. Please try again when connected to a mobile network, or connect to a Wi-Fi network. If the problem persists, call Customer Care.
A problem occurred while communicating with Google servers.
Can’t establish a reliable data connection to the server.
This could be a temporary problem or your SIM card may not be provisioned for data services. If it continues, call Customer Care.
Invalid character. Only 0-9, a-z, A-Z and full stops are allowed.
Your phone is not connected to a data service. To view this information now, go to %s from any computer connected to the Internet.
This is not a valid domain name
This is not a valid username
Enter your username only, not your email address
This is not a valid account name

string.name: about_accounts_message
string.font:
It’s easy to set up your phone! All you need is a Google Account.

Why use a Google Account?

With a Google Account, Google applications are synced automatically between your phone and computer, regardless of where you make an update.

Already have a Google Account?

Then you’re all set! Simply touch “Sign in” on the next screen.

Don’t have a Google Account?

No problem. Touch “Create” on the next screen and we’ll help you set one up.

Touch ”Next” to get started!

resources.string: Slide your finger up or down the screen to scroll.\n(Touch this message to dismiss it.)
Sign in with the Google account that you want linked to this phone.
Sign in with an enterprise account configured to use Google services.
Want to set up an account later?
By continuing, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
Your phone needs to communicate with Google servers to set up your account. This may take up to five minutes.
Your phone needs to communicate with Google servers to find your domain information. This may take up to five minutes.
By signing in, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
Sign in with your Google Account:
Enter your username and password for ^1:
This account cannot be used on the phone because it belongs to an inactive domain. Please contact the domain administrator for ^1 or sign in with another account.
The text entered is not a valid username.

There is a problem connecting to your company's servers at ^1.

Error information:
The web login page has redirected too many times
This account has been disabled. \n\n(For details, go to http://google.co.uk/accounts on your computer.)
Your username and password do not match. Please try again. \n\n(To recover your account information, go to http://google.co.uk/accounts on your computer.)

This account has not been verified. Please check your email on a computer and follow the link to verify this account. \n\n(To recover your account information, go to http://google.co.uk/accounts on your computer.)
Type the characters that you see in the picture below:
By creating this account, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
^1 contains less than 6 or more than 30 characters.
^1 can contain only letters,\nnumbers and full stops.
Your passwords don’t match. Please retype them.
In case you lose your password.
The password is too weak or contains invalid characters. Please try again.
An error occurred. Please try again.

string.name: account_linked_message
string.font: Your Google Account is now linked to this phone.

string.name: syncing_message
string.font:
Google applications are syncing data now. 

%i When the ”syncing” icon disappears from the status bar at the top of your screen, the download has finished.

About the status bar…

Whenever you receive a new message or other notification, an icon appears on the status bar.

Use your finger to drag down the status bar to open the Notifications panel, with details about all your current notifications.

resources.string: Tap here to rerun Setup Wizard

Quick set up 
You have opened an application that requires you to link a Google Account to your phone. It’s easy and only takes a few steps. 

Google applications will always be in sync between your phone and computer. 

Touch “Next” to continue or press the Back button to exit.

Adding an account 

You can use more than one Google Account on your phone (such as your home and work accounts). Adding a Google Account takes just a few steps. 

Touch “Next” to continue or press your phone's Back button to exit.

You need to link a Gmail account with this phone. 

You already have a Gmail username (^1) associated with this account, but it is not currently active. 

Touch “Next” to re-activate this username and use it with your phone. 

Or, if you want to use a different account, press the Back button and sign in with or create a different account.
The following information will help you recover your password if it is ever lost
The email address entered is not valid.\n Example: joe@example.co.uk
Secondary email addresses cannot be the same as the one that you are creating

There are some important things to understand to get the most out of your phone. 
 

Using the on-screen keyboard 
 
Touch “Begin” to start the tutorial and find out more.

There are some important things to understand to get the most out of your phone. 
 

Using the on-screen keyboard 

Setting up a Google Account 
 
Touch “Begin” to start the tutorial and find out more or touch “Skip” to skip this tutorial and continue.
Touch any text field to open the keyboard and start typing. Try it here!
Finished typing? Press your phone\'s Back button to close the keyboard.
Google\'s location service provides applications with your approximate location without using GPS.
You can disable these features in Settings, under Location & Security \u0020and under Privacy.
Allow Google\'s location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running.
Use My Location for Google search results and other Google services.

You can use your Google Account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data. If you previously backed up with this account, you can restore it to this device now.
You can change your backup settings at any time in the Settings application, under Privacy.
Keep this device backed up with my Google Account
Restore from my Google Account to this device
If you have previously backed up your settings, they will be restored.
Your settings will not be restored from backup.
Your company\'s servers are sending sign-in information to your phone. This may take a few minutes.\nYour company\'s sign-in page will appear when this is complete.
This domain is not using Google Apps. Please check the domain name and try again.
